0.title: Makeup remover wipes 3x1
0.description:
Make-up remover wipes, with the ability to easily and quickly remove face, eye and lip make-up

  • Waterproof makeup remover
  • Removes any grease and pollution from the skin
  • Without causing skin sensitivity
  • Skin moisturizer and softener
  • Contains nutrients and extracts of aloe vera, chamomile, marigold, cucumber and lemon to maintain the softness and clarity of the skin.
  • Suitable packaging for using all sheets
  • Free of alcohol, paraben and soap
